movie.title: Golden Swallow
movie.description_intro: The indomitable martial arts team of director Chang Cheh and stunt choreographer Liu Chia-liang continues the compelling saga of Golden Swallow from King Hu's Come Drink with Me in this sequel of heartbreaking romance, jianghu intrigue and stunning action.
movie.description_full: The indomitable martial arts team of director Chang Cheh and stunt choreographer Liu Chia-liang continues the compelling saga of Golden Swallow from King Hu's Come Drink with Me in this sequel of heartbreaking romance, jianghu intrigue and stunning action.

movies.title: Pariah: The Lives and Deaths of Sonny Liston
movies.title_english: Pariah: The Lives and Deaths of Sonny Liston
movies.title_long: Pariah: The Lives and Deaths of Sonny Liston (2019)
movies.summary: Overcoming the seemingly insurmountable odds that life threw his way, Liston became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. Just eight years later, his wife finds him dead in their Las Vegas home from a supposed heroin overdose. Suspicion as to the cause of death pervaded among those that knew him.
movies.description_full: Overcoming the seemingly insurmountable odds that life threw his way, Liston became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. Just eight years later, his wife finds him dead in their Las Vegas home from a supposed heroin overdose. Suspicion as to the cause of death pervaded among those that knew him.
movies.synopsis: Overcoming the seemingly insurmountable odds that life threw his way, Liston became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. movies.title: 3 Lives
movies.summary: A woman on the run from ruthless kidnappers discovers her rescuer is the man jailed for attacking her 15 years earlier.
movies.description_full: A woman on the run from ruthless kidnappers discovers her rescuer is the man jailed for attacking her 15 years earlier.
movies.synopsis: A woman on the run from ruthless kidnappers discovers her rescuer is the man jailed for attacking her 15 years earlier.

movies.title: Jacob's Ladder
movies.summary: Jacob Singer is trying to make sense of his fractured life and memories. Plagued by hallucinations, flashbacks, and conspiracies, he struggles down a path to enlightenment from these manic strains. With nothing but support from friends and loved ones will he be able to push through the haze of his PTSD.

With nothing but support from friends and loved ones will he be able to push through the haze of his PTSD.

movies.title: The Southerner
movies.summary: Sam Tucker, a cotton picker, in search of a better future for his family, decides to grow his own cotton crop. In the first year, the Tuckers battle disease, a flood, and a jealous neighbor. Can they make it as farmers?
